channel.title: Monsters?
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Monsters?" - Wondering if anyone could or will eventually work on adding a page with monsters stat blocks?

item.title: Re: Monsters?
item.content:encoded: I'd have to agree on the 'not adding monsters' at the moment, since to me atleast, the wikidot in my eyes has existed as a 'player resource' website, which is why a lot of DM focused things dont show up here, since the website isn't super built for DM's in my mind

item.title: Re: Monsters?
item.content:encoded:
I would agree with qorinthian on this, that would be a very big project and I'm not sure it's necessary.

There are other tools, and I always saw this site as being more of a player resource than a DM resource. Not saying everyone thinks that, but that's how I've seen it.

item.title: Re: Monsters?
item.content:encoded: It may be a possibility in the future, but in all honesty, 5e.tools already has a great searchable compilation of the miscellaneous stuff like monsters and items. I wouldn't expect this to be on our radar any time soon.

item.title: Monsters?
item.content:encoded: I've been wondering for some time if anyone will end up adding a page similar to the magic items page but with all the monsters stat blocks. Sorry if this is already a thread if it is I couldn't find it. I realize this is a big thing if anyone decides to add it so not expecting anything anytime soon if at all just wanted to ask.
